summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Bitter Lake Walkthrough
            - Section Title: Yoaguai King Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Star

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Bitter Lake Walkthrough

As you draw close, you'll hear a voice coming from the cymbals, who is arguing with a woman refusing to let the trapped person out. With a loud gong, the trapped "Admiral" will use the cymbal to awaken a giant turtle whose mountainous shell you're actually standing on.

As the turtle begins to swim through the Bitter Seal, the woman will become aware of your presence, starting this new region off with a bang of a boss fight.

## Yoaguai King Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Star

At around half health, she'll start to get madder, and teleport high up to summon several groups of electrical bolts that will fly out in small clusters to track you down. You can't deflect them with your staff, so either use Cloud Step or stick to dodging.

After this, she'll trigger a thunderstorm that darkens the arena, filling you the area with static electricity and most likely giving you the Shocked status effect. Take a moment to use a Shock-Quelling medicine."
            - Following Text: "Right after she inflicts you with Shock, she'll trigger an even bigger lightning storm to try and maximize her damage against you, which is another good time to make yourself scarce with Cloud Step, and otherwise keep running around to avoid the attacks."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text describes the start of the Yoaguai King boss fight in the "Bitter Lake Walkthrough." The boss, Kang-Jin Star, becomes more aggressive at half health, teleporting to summon tracking electrical bolts and triggering a thunderstorm that darkens the arena. Players are advised to dodge the bolts and use Shock-Quelling medicine to counter the Shocked status effect caused by the storm.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts an intense moment during the Yoaguai King boss fight with Kang-Jin Star. The arena is dark and stormy, filled with lightning bolts and static electricity. The player character, armed with a staff, is shown mid-combat, facing the towering, glowing figure of Kang-Jin Star in the distance. The environment emphasizes the chaotic and electrified nature of the battle.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text explains that after inflicting the Shocked status, Kang-Jin Star escalates the fight by summoning an even larger lightning storm to maximize damage. Players are advised to use Cloud Step to evade and keep moving to avoid the attacks.
